ociinstitutions_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions in ${node}
ociinstitutions_file_removed: ${user} removed ${path_type} ${path} from Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions in ${node}
ociinstitutions_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions in ${node}
ociinstitutions_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions in ${node}
ociinstitutions_folder_selected: ${user} linked Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions folder ${folder} to ${node}
ociinstitutions_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions addon for ${node}
ociinstitutions_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions addon for ${node}
ociinstitutions_node_deauthorized_no_use: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure for Institutions addon for ${node} deauthorized
